text: @mattiapolibio that’s two different cases, you and coronavirus are on different levels. corona is a worldwide pandemic, and you’re just another racist and homophobic tiktok boy who will never understand the severity of his words. still haven’t apologized even AFTER receipts getting exposed. https://t.co/4Mr98vUARD
